references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: SDXL is frequently mentioned in the paper and forms the basis for comparison and improvement, highlighting its significance as a state-of-the-art model.
The DiT architecture forms the base of many models that the authors are using and is noted to be of significant importance due to the quadratic scaling with spatial resolution for attention layers.
This is one of the key papers upon which the authors' method builds, as it is used for diffusion distillation, thus it provides a baseline and a source of inspiration.

references.paper_title: Improved distribution matching distillation for fast image synthesis
references.reason: DMD2 is a frequently cited, it is the main diffusion distillation method that the authors extend and modify with SWD and PDM.
This reference is crucial due to its foundational role in establishing the underlying principles of diffusion models.
